title: Which three states formed the Triple Alliance? - Quora

response.answer_text: Germany Austria-Hungary Italy - did not go to war on the side of the other two. Later joined the Allies because they were promised Austro-Hungarian territory full of Italians (Treaty of Rome). Allies reneged because President Willson was naive, hypocritical, know-it-all who screwed up the world worse than it was. The Royal Navy should have sunk his ship on the way over.
